edu.rit.gpu

Class GpuVbl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.gpu.GpuVbl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GpuArray, GpuByteVbl, GpuDoubleVbl, GpuFloatVbl, GpuIntVbl, GpuLongVbl, GpuMatrix, GpuShortVbl, GpuStructVbl

    public abstract class GpuVbl
extends Object
    Class GpuVbl is the abstract base class for a GPU variable. This is a block of data stored in the GPU's memory and mirrored in the CPU's memory. Construct an instance of a subclass of class GpuVbl by calling a factory method on a Gpu object or a Module object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void devToHost()
      Copy this GPU variable from the GPU device's memory to the host CPU's memory.
      protected void finalize()
      Finalize this GPU variable.
      void free()
      Free this GPU variable's storage in the GPU device's memory.
      abstract void hostToDev()
      Copy this GPU variable from the host CPU's memory to the GPU device's memory.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • hostToDev

        public abstract void hostToDev()
        Copy this GPU variable from the host CPU's memory to the GPU device's memory.
        Throws:
        GpuException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if a GPU error occurred.

      • devToHost

        public abstract void devToHost()
        Copy this GPU variable from the GPU device's memory to the host CPU's memory.
        Throws:
        GpuException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if a GPU error occurred.

      • free

        public void free()
        Free this GPU variable's storage in the GPU device's memory. If this GPU variable was not dynamically allocated, the free() method does nothing.

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
        Finalize this GPU variable.
        Overrides:
        finalize in class Object
